ygData.subject: Sealed Vials - The answer
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, We ve received a few requests for information regarding the craftability of sealed vials in the game. I thought I d stop by and lend a hand. Sealed
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

We've received a few requests for information regarding the craftability of sealed vials in the game. I thought I'd stop by and lend a hand.

Sealed vials are currently not craftable by players, despite the sketch being available on a vendor. Our craft designer is currently looking at poison and pottery, and they'll be getting an update after the New Year.

When the sealed vial does become craftable, you'll see the recipe listed in your book.

-Gordon

I found this on the safe house message board. I know no one answered my sealed vial post, but in case you were thinking about it. I guess don't bother. I wonder how much this applies to brewing.

Tanana (Bristlebane)
Master Brewer, Potter, Beggar
